commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All the third-years were so nice.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Right? Kanan is always casual and helpful, Dia has her stuff together, and Mari always brings us together with a smile.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: They're like the big sisters of Aqours. We count on them a lot!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That reminds me of all the other girls.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The other girls from Nijigasaki?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. There are third-year students in our idol club, too. Everyone has their own quirks, but they're all dependable.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* You don't say! I'd love to meet your idol club sometime.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: As for the rest of Aqours, there's just the first-year students, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah. They should be in the club room. Oh, here we are.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hanamaru, Yoshiko, Ruby--

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Black is the only option! Blend into the night and slip through the crowd of revelers! It should be designed to completely cover the upper body, with a hood, too!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That's a cape, not a happi coat, zura!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We're going to wander around the festival in black capes and hoods? That's so scary! We'll be like spirits!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: No one'll notice if an extra existence or two appears in their group.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Denied, zura! We don't want to summon any weird beings in the festival.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Why not? Even otherworldly beings enjoy festive summer nights!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You're all the otherworldly being we can handle, Yoshiko. Huh? Chika?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Hey, Chika. When did you get here?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You should have said something.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Looks like everyone in Aqours is unique, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ahaha...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hm? Who's that?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's the fan from Tokyo I texted you about yesterday.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nice to meet you.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Oh ho! Applying to become a little demon of your own accord. Impressive! I admire your will and shall allow you to serve me!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I think she's saying let's be friends, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Don't translate it like that! I, Yohane, will not have my majesty sullied!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yohane? Um, aren't you Yoshiko Tsushima?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's like her nickname.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I see.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: At least sound more surprised or something!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What are you guys doing? Wait, were you planning the stage outfits?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Nope. We were debating the design of the happi coats we're going to wear at the festival. That's our job as first-years.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We've split all the work between the nine of us. The menu we're going to serve at the food cart, the choreography for the Bon dance, stuff like that.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: And prep for our live show, too. We're performing on the second day of the festival. We practice between prep work, zura.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What does "zura" mean?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh! Er, I just, uh, say it. It's like a bad habit. Don't worry about it, zura!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's pretty cute!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: My heart's been racing ever since we decided to do this live show!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You say that before every live show.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Y-Yeah, but I just can't help worrying about if our audience will have fun, or if I'll make mistakes and stuff.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I get it. When I hear about a live show, my heart pounds. I wonder how many people we'll send to hell!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Enough of that hell talk. I just want to give our audience the time of their lives, zura.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you three trying to find your own way to shine through this festival?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Giggle* Looks like Chika's given you her initiation.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: My initiation? Have I done something weird?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: No. I've been searching for Aqours' special way to shine, too, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I thought our seductive smiles tingling with hellfire was what made Aqours, though.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Definitely not, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Don't shut me down so quickly!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Putting the seductive smile talk aside...I want to find our own way to shine and put on a special show only we can do.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks for talking with me. Sorry I interrupted your work.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Don't worry about it. It was fun talking with you, zura.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hold on. Are you guys at a roadblock with the happi design? It seemed like that when we first got here.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: No, we're fine! We're nearly at a conclusion, zura.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: At least we've avoided the completely black and ghostly design.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Black is no good? Okay, fine. How about a purple cape?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Let's move away from capes altogether, zura.
